markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Harbinger's Caw](/Feats.aspx?ID=2442) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Misfortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=110" />
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
A creature within 60 feet is about to attempt an attack roll or skill check.

</column>

---

You caw ominously, cursing the creature with misfortune. The target creature must roll the triggering check twice and take the lower result.
name: Harbinger's Caw
